useCase.name: Deposit Collection
useCase.description: Curator deposits a collection into the system.

preconditions.precondition: Curator has selected a collection to deposit.

successEndConditions.condition: Deposit details are successfully saved in the database.

mainSequence.step: Curator selects a collection to deposit.
Curator provides deposit details (including embargo date).
Deposit Interface requests deposit details from Curator.
Deposit Interface validates details (including embargo date).
Deposit Interface saves deposit details in the database.
Notification Service sends confirmation to Curator.
